EngageManifest.Title: Legacy
EngageManifest.Description: Mimicks the structure of Engage: Rotator 1.x. Displays a constant header title and link, then the image, title, content, and "read more", all wrapped in links. Outside of the rotator are the pager images and titles, followed by previous, pause, and next links, and finally the position counter ("1 of 2").
